meta.description: Collection de prompts réussis pour référence et réutilisation

prompts.prompt: A heavy wooden door with iron lock and mysterious symbol, medieval theme, simple line art, minimal colors (black and brown only), high contrast, clean lines, white background, suitable for economical printing
prompts.negative_prompt: gradient, photorealistic, detailed textures, many colors, dark background, shadows
prompts.success_notes: Parfait pour impression économique, très clair

prompts.prompt: An ancient treasure chest slightly open with golden glow, medieval theme, colorful illustration, 4-5 vibrant colors, medium detail, engaging and fun, educational style, clear and readable
prompts.negative_prompt: photorealistic, overly complex, too many details, dark or muddy colors

prompts.prompt: An old parchment map with marked locations and compass rose, medieval theme, simple line art, sepia and brown tones, white background, high contrast, clean lines
prompts.negative_prompt: gradient, photorealistic, detailed textures, many colors, dark background

prompts.prompt: A puzzle with geometric symbols and patterns, medieval theme, simple line art, minimal colors (black and blue only), high contrast, clean lines, white background, suitable for printing
prompts.negative_prompt: gradient, photorealistic, complex textures, many colors, dark background

prompts.prompt: Right triangle with sides labeled a, b, c, clean educational diagram, didactic style, clear labels possible, maximum clarity, instructional design, simple and understandable, minimal colors
Coordinate system with vectors and arrows, clean educational diagram, didactic style, blue and black colors, instructional design, maximum clarity, white background
Laboratory equipment setup for experiment, flat design, geometric shapes, 3-4 colors, simple composition, educational style, modern minimalist
prompts.success_notes: Moderne et clair, bon pour numérique et impression

prompts.prompt: A curious student solving a puzzle with mathematical symbols, simple cartoon style, friendly character, 4-5 colors, fun and engaging, suitable for middle school students, white background
prompts.negative_prompt: realistic, complex, detailed shading, photographic, dark

prompts.prompt: Coordinate system with function curve and key points marked, clean educational diagram, didactic style, blue and black, instructional design, maximum clarity, white background
Plant cell diagram with labeled organelles, educational illustration, didactic style, clear and simple, suitable for students, minimal colors, white background
prompts.negative_prompt: photorealistic, artistic, overly detailed, complex textures

prompts.prompt: A detective character holding magnifying glass examining clues, detective investigation theme, simple cartoon style, friendly character, basic shapes, approachable and fun, suitable for young students, 4-5 colors
prompts.negative_prompt: realistic, complex, detailed shading, photographic, scary

prompts.prompt: A simple rocket ship in space, science fiction theme, flat design, geometric shapes, simple composition, bold colors (3-4 colors), modern minimalist style, white background
prompts.success_notes: Moderne et épuré, parfait pour thème spatial

prompts.prompt: An open book with visible pages, literary theme, simple line art, minimal colors (black and blue only), clean lines, white background, suitable for economical printing
prompts.negative_prompt: gradient, photorealistic, detailed textures, many colors, dark background

prompts.prompt: A simple globe showing continents, geographical elements, educational illustration, didactic style, 3-4 colors, clear and simple, suitable for students, white background
prompts.negative_prompt: photorealistic, overly detailed, complex textures, many colors

prompts.prompt: A simple clock showing time management, flat design, geometric shapes, simple composition, 2-3 bold colors, modern minimalist style, white background
